name: Suspicious Reg Add BitLocker
description: Detects suspicious addition to BitLocker related registry keys via the reg.exe utility
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Ee][Gg].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Aa][Dd][Dd].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ff][Vv][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Vv].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Ff].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Dd][Ee][Ww][Ii][Tt][Hh][Nn][Oo][Tt][Pp][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ss][Ee][Aa][Dd][Vv][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee][Dd][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ss][Ee][Tt][Pp][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ss][Ee][Tt][Pp][Mm][Kk][Ee][Yy].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ss][Ee][Tt][Pp][Mm][Kk][Ee][Yy][Pp][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Cc][Oo][Vv][Ee][Rr][Yy][Kk][Ee][Yy][Mm][Ee][Ss][Ss][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss][Oo][Uu][Rr][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ss][Ee][Tt][Pp][Mm][Pp][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Cc][Oo][Vv][Ee][Rr][Yy][Kk][Ee][Yy][Mm][Ee][Ss][Ss][Aa][Gg][Ee].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*REG* AND process.command_line:*ADD* AND process.command_line:*\\SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\FVE* AND process.command_line:*\/v* AND process.command_line:*\/f* AND process.command_line:(*EnableBDEWithNoTPM* OR *UseAdvancedStartup* OR *UseTPM* OR *UseTPMKey* OR *UseTPMKeyPIN* OR *RecoveryKeyMessageSource* OR *UseTPMPIN* OR *RecoveryKeyMessage*))`
